name: JavaScript
description:
'JavaScript' provides easy access to iOS's fast JavaScript environment.

A 'WebView' object is the source of all of the libraries capabilities.

Please see the included demos for usage examples.

Features:
- HTML & JavaScript loading from string variables or file.
- Imported Lua functions available to JavaScript.
- JavaScript functions easily callable from Lua.
- JavaScript ES module support.
- JavaScript proxy objects to let Lua know when a value has been set.
- Full documentation powered by LDoc.
- Fullscreen viewing of the WebView (call WebView:show() )
update_notes: - Update STLib with runAsync function to allow calling yielding functions from the main Lua coroutine (not a coroutine).
